IBS.LS.summary: Ibersol, S.G.P.S., S.A., through its subsidiaries, operates a network of restaurant units in Portugal, Spain, Italy, and Angola. The company operates restaurant units under various brands, including Pizza Hut, Pasta CaffÃ©, Pans & Company, Ribs, FresCo, SantaMaria, Kentucky Fried Chicken, Burger King, O' Kilo, Roulotte, Quiosques, Pizza MÃ³vil, Miit, Taco Bell, Sol, SugestÃµes e OpÃ§Ãµes, Silva Carvalho Catering e Palace Catering, travel, coffe counters, and other concessions contract. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 659 restaurants, which include 547 owned units and 112 franchised units. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Porto, Portugal. Ibersol, S.G.P.S., S.A. is a subsidiary of ATPS - SGPS, S.A.
